description: System-generated unique identifier for this priority record, serving as the primary key.
Business code for the priority used in applications or integrations; distinct from the surrogate key. Likely the displayed numeric code; confirm with SME.
Label describing the priority category used across maintenance procedures, work orders, or similar activities.
Numeric sequence controlling the display or ranking order of priorities in lists.
Free-text notes providing additional context about the priority definition.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Likely timestamp of the last change made by a user rather than a system process; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created this record.
Timestamp when a user created this record.
Identifier of the user account that last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record.
